product_name: NOCO Genius Boost Ultrasafe Jump Starter
long_description: This pocket-size power boost holds a charge for 1 year, so you can jump start your car, boat or lawn mower in an emergency. The compact size fits perfectly in glove boxes for extra peace of mind.
short_description: This pocket-size power boost holds a charge for 1 year, so you can jump start your car, boat or lawn mower in an emergency. The compact size fits perfectly in glove boxes for extra peace of mind.
